Reviews.Title: “No surprises :)”
Reviews.Author: Revitalka
Reviews.Content: ok exactly expected price location bonus close train buses spend time outside hotel hours sleep night staff super nice helpful

Reviews.Title: “So helpful!”
Reviews.Author: adriana k
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel rome school trip helpful ronaldo assisted nicest hotel encounted stay italy hotel clean beautiful views street main strip lots little cafes resturants recommend hotel rome

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and clean”
Reviews.Author: Lualy
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel bit unsure hotel buzz hotel floor lots steps elevator lift 100 ago laugh despite initial spacious bathroom clean serviced daily fresh towels provided staff friendly especially despite little english little italian helpful cheerful smiling location hotel perfect near train metro getting mins walk colleseum trevi fountain pantheon downpoint breakfast terrible little choice recommend friend looking ideally located didnt spend fortune

Reviews.Title: “very nice location and services!”
Reviews.Author: damadistratta
Reviews.Content: ive hotel months ago vas nice trip location hotel usefull city easy approach al main bus train stations people reception request disposal 24 clean nice hotel reccomand family friends partner

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, but hotel has some issues.”
Reviews.Author: K_Q_10
Reviews.Content: location nice quiet street close lots attractions nicely finished shower narrow cant touch toes air conditioning free internet requires pay time registration fee discovered wifi reception staff didnt speak english friendly managed communication mohammed using broken french helping nice restaurant actually walked traveling friends booked toilet didnt moved day friends stuff moved manager impression roommates checked booked size closet little single bed result partner taking cot friend someplace sleep

Reviews.Title: “It's okay for the price”
Reviews.Author: Myut
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights isnt exactly hotel ive stayed weird door phone hotel 2nd floor ring bell inside receptionist sounded angry rang doorbell time check rest stay tiny clean sadly wasnt aircondition definitely wouldnt stay mid summer window facing towards shady courtyard didnt spite missing aircon shower bad clean youre light sleeper definitely stay easily hear time people walk pass door morning theyre talking quietly okay hotel friend breakfast hotel location walk besides theres spar supermarket corner handy otherwise expensive city 3 stars location cleanliness pay oh rome wonderful recommend trip 15 euro value money enjoy

HotelInfo.Name: Clarin Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via Palermo 36, 00184 Rome, Italy
